title: I HAVE BEEN BANNED
body:
Riot...I dont like AFK even i hate them so much i cant play LoL for months but this is insane...
I recently got banned for 20 mins bcs my PC crashed and its not for 1st time...its happining a lot 
I love LoL i spent my time on it that much i dont go to school but i really dont want to wait 20 min
I apologize to guys in my team when I lefted but pls Riot be kind...
PS:get off that ban pls ...Love Ya

replies.body:
It's unfortunate, but we cannot remove these penalties under any condition. Regardless of your intent, your absence negatively impacts everyone in the match. This is a key reason as to why the system acts against disconnections equally and why we cannot modify these LPQ's.

If you can provide more details around the crashes that you're experiencing, we can work together to troubleshoot them and resolve them so you can avoid Leaverbuster penalties in the future.
